name: Aeronautical Services of Greenwood
about: Aeronautical Services of Greenwood, located at 322 Terminal Road in Greenwood, South Carolina, is a dedicated flying school committed to providing top-notch aviation training. With a focus on safety and professionalism, our facility offers a range of services including flight instruction, aircraft maintenance, and aviation support. Our experienced instructors and meticulously maintained aircraft ensure that students receive the highest quality training. Whether you are pursuing a private pilot's license or advancing your aviation career, Aeronautical Services of Greenwood is your trusted partner in achieving your flying goals. We are dedicated to helping you soar to new heights.
